circumstances:
The airplane departed RA Swinderby at 2224LT on June 18 on an operation to Bremen. Approaching the Dutch coast, it was shot down by a German fighter and crashed into the sea off Terschelling. The entire crew was killed. 
Crew:
P/O J. Krassowski, 
Sgt R. Boukowski, 
F/O K. Bernas, 
Sgt S. Franaszezuk, 
Sgt M. Manasiak, 
Sgt A. Wagner.
probable_cause: Shot down by a German fighter.
